title: BBC Local Live: Greater Manchester and east Cheshire on Wednesday 9 November - BBC News
summary: plans to demolish the concrete wall in piccadilly gardens are to be submitted .
pm announces a new £ 11m trade deal for bolton clinical waste company .
stockport bypass route to be changed to save 200-year-old pub .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for greater manchester and east cheshire have finished for the day but we 'll be back from 08:00 on thursday with more of the latest news , sport , weather and travel .

documents.title: weather : cold with scattered showers
text: weather : cold with scattered showers

documents.title: sale moor plans unveiled
text: trafford council says it has come up with some proposals for the future of a controversial patch of land in sale moor .
the site on warrener street is currently a council-owned car park - and earlier this year local residents launched a campaign against plans to build a budget supermarket there .
the new ideas for the site will go on display on 22 november .

documents.title: mystery of lost world war two love note solved
text: the mystery of a lost love letter from a woman to her world war two sweetheart has been solved after the couple 's daughter came forward to claim it .
the 1945 letter from dorothy to aircraftman harry hughes in ceylon - now sri lanka - was found in the lost property box at asda 's store in leigh , greater manchester .
barbara white said she is `` so grateful '' to be reunited with the letter .
the wartime sweethearts married in 1946 and `` made each other happy '' , she said .
ms white , who is 63 and now lives in nottingham , said she was surprised to spot her father 's name in an online appeal to find the letter 's owners .

documents.title: four men sentenced over moss side murder
text: four men have been sentenced for their role in the murder of a man who was `` brutally '' stabbed in moss side .
ahmed mohammed , known as mudi , died on crondall street in march from wounds to the neck and chest .
all four were found guilty at manchester crown court .

documents.title: tumble dryer safety warning issued after two fires
text: two tumble dryer fires in the space of 24 hours have led cheshire fire and rescue service to issue safety advice .
nobody was hurt after a fire yesterday in chelford road , knutsford and one just before 08:00 today in richmond avenue , warrington .
lint within the dryer is believed to be the cause of second fire .

nick evans , cheshire fire 's head of prevention , said : tumble dryers are being used more now the weather has turned , so it is important that anyone using one follows some basic , but vital , safety advice to reduce the risk of fire . ''
simple steps include ensuring you remove the lint after every load of clothes has been dried , and never leaving the dryer running overnight or while you are out

documents.title: headlines from greater manchester
text: headlines from greater manchester

documents.title: football : rochdale name terminally ill youngster in matchday squad
text: rochdale have named five-year-old joshua mccormack in their squad for their checkatrade trophy match at hartlepool united .
the rochdale youngster was diagnosed with a brain tumour last year and was told it was terminal in september .

joshua will not be able to attend the game at northern gas and power stadium on wednesday but will have a shirt hung up in the changing room and will be named as one of dale 's seven substitutes , with the squad number 55 .
`` he has touched the hearts of everyone at rochdale since we met him for the first time back in february , '' manager keith hill told the club website .
`` we hope this one small gesture can bring some light to his family during this difficult time . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: special needs warning for rochdale council and nhs
text: an investigation has found 'significant areas of weakness ' in services and support for children with disabilities and special educational needs in rochdale .
author: Manchester Evening News
Manchester Evening News

documents.title: cricket : lancashire legend gives hameed his first cap
text: lancashire have shared a of england and red rose great mike atherton presenting haseeb hameed with his first cap ahead of his international debut in india .
hameed , only the second teenager to debut for england since 1949 , scored 13 runs from his first nine balls and was dropped , but was later out lbw for 31 .
former lancashire star david lloyd thought hameed 's knock was reminiscent of the man who had given him his cap .
a brilliant photo a @ twitterid legend , to a future star .
@ athersmike awards @ twitterid his @ twitterid cap ahead of his debut .
hameed looked very assured athertonesque
only a bit tidier
took him a while this year at lancs to get the skill of working the ball for a single .
when he can do that consistently

documents.title: manchester united heart attack fan in 'life saver ' appeal
text: a manchester united fan who had a heart attack outside the club 's stadium has made an appeal to find the man who helped `` save his life '' .
chris madden , 57 , left the old trafford ground after the 0-0 draw with burnley on 29 october when he felt breathless .
he slumped over a car at a nearby showroom when a fellow united supporter , believed to be a doctor in his 50s , came to his aid .
mr madden said the man stayed with him for an hour until paramedics arrived .

documents.title: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: researchers find 'racism in workplace '
text: researchers from the university of manchester have found substantial evidence of racism in the uk workplace .
the study has investigated close to 25,000 accounts of racist harassment or bullying at work , and has looked into how employers promote equality , diversity and fairness .

documents.title: stockport man arrested in terror investigation
text: a 31-year-old man has been arrested in stockport on sus of distributing terrorist material .
the man was taken into custody at about 08:00 , where he remains for questioning .
greater manchester police said a house in stockport is being searched in connection with his arrest .

documents.title: study finds coronation street is 'unhealthiest soap '
text: a study has found that coronation street is the unhealthiest tv soap .
corrie , along with emmerdale , eastenders and hollyoaks , was examined over a two-week period , with researchers looking at exercising , drinking water and healthy eating .
while they found emmerdale characters drank the most alcohol , it was the street that did the least exercise and the most sitting on the sofa - and corrie 's characters also ate the most takeaways .
a spokesperson for coronation street said :
we present a balanced view of alcohol consumption , healthy eating and the lifestyles of our characters as we take our responsibilities for these issues seriously .
characters do frequent the pub but we also see them engaging in exercise and we have explored lifestyle related health issues through many different storylines .
author: BBC Entertainment and Arts

documents.title: tributes to young man who fell to his death in manchester city centre
text: tributes have been paid to a young man who fell to his death in manchester city centre .
author: Manchester Evening News
Manchester Evening News

text: this is what manchester 's piccadilly gdns could look like under plans for a big revamp .
not much confidence if only described as could look like
well it 's all subject to planning approval - so nothing 's certain until after that

@ twitterid i hope it does !

at the moment it 's like a giant refugee camp .
nearly back to how it looks in the 1950 's

need to get rid of the fountains , drop it by 10ft and have a formal gardens , with flowers and a grass embankment !
more trees less buildings

documents.title: three-weekly bin collection rolled out across salford
text: thousands of salford residents will soon switch to three-weekly black bin collections , instead of fortnightly , after a pilot across half the city .
council chiefs say more than 1,000 tonnes of rubbish has been saved from landfill , and nearly £ 500,000 from its budget , since 50,000 households made the switch in july .
stage two of the plan , starting in march , will cover another 25 % of the city with all households on reduced collections by august .

documents.title: bypass plan changed to keep 200-year-old pub
text: plans for a new multimillion-pound bypass in stockport have been changed to save a 200-year-old pub .
under the old proposals for the link road between the a6 and the m60 , the midland pub was going to be demolished to make way for a cycle path .
the council says the plan has been changed to keep the pub for the community .
the amended plan is now under consultation .

documents.title: cricket : lancashire teenager makes england debut
text: at 19 years and 297 days , lancashire 's haseeb hameed has become the fifth youngest player to play for england and the second youngest to open , the youngest being jack crawford in 1906 .
but how did he get on in his debut test innings against india ?
hameed , only the second teenager to debut for england since 1949 , looked organised and composed before being pinned lbw by off-spinner r ashwin .
the bolton-born batsmen scored 13 runs from his first nine balls and was dropped , but went 31 .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: collapsed victoria station roof panel sent away for tests
text: a roof panel which collapsed at manchester 's victoria station last month , injuring two people , has been sent away for testing .
the panel caved in on 18 october following heavy rain , causing gallons of water '' to fall onto the platform below .
an investigation into why the plastic panel , part of the station 's new £ 20m roof , failed is ongoing , a spokesperson for network rail said .
the damaged panel was replaced five days after the incident and a full condition survey of the rest of the roof found no further problems , the spokesperson added .

documents.title: mother 's warning after son critically injured in road accident
text: a mother has issued a warning to drivers who stop in dangerous spots after her son was critically injured in a road accident .
author: Bolton News
The Bolton News

documents.title: football : manchester city women v brondby
text: manchester city women boss nick cushing believes his side 's last-16 tie against danish side brondby will be the hardest test of their maiden women 's champions league campaign so far .
city are the last british side in the competition after a 6-0 aggregate win over zvezda 2005 in the previous round .
the women 's super league champions host the first leg on wednesday before the second leg , in denmark , on 16 november .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: manchester piccadilly gardens : wall demolition welcomed on social media
text: plans to remove the current wall and pavilion in piccadilly gardens have been welcomed on social media .
the £ 10m revamp of the manchester landmark will see two new pavilion buildings sitting alongside improved gardens and lighting , as well as new bars and restaurants .
posting on twitter , robert varley said : `` loving the plans to regenerate manchester piccadilly gardens .
i 'll be there to watch the wall get torn down ''
jessica simpson added : `` whose bright idea was it in the first place for that concrete monstrosity ?
taxpayers money wasted . ''
revamp er revamped.the infamous wall in manchester 's piccadilly gdns to be removed .
gardens to be extended and replanted in £ 10m plan .
and whose bright idea was it in the first place for that concrete monstrosity ?
taxpayers money wasted
loving the plans to regenerate manchester piccadilly gardens .
i 'll be there to watch the wall get torn down
watch ?
give me a hammer ! !
absolutely detest it & that damned ugly tower block too .

documents.title: fake model scout targets young girls
text: fake social media accounts have been used to deceive teenage girls in the uk into sending indecent images .
base models , a london model agency , said it had received more than 40 reports from girls who said they were contacted online by someone claiming to work for the company as a model scout .
a 19-year-old student based in manchester , ellie mccandles , said she had received an approach on snapchat asking her to send of herself in her underwear .
she declined and contacted the agency .
something did n't feel right about it

documents.title: murderer who sexually abused schoolgirl while on day release jailed
text: a murderer who molested a schoolgirl while on day release from a life sentence has been jailed .
author: Manchester Evening News
Manchester Evening News

documents.title: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines for greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: bolton company to work with hospitals in india
text: the prime minister theresa may has announced a new multi-million pound trade deal for a bolton company during her visit to india .
vernacare which provides waste services for nearly all hospitals in the uk is going to start working with hospitals in india , ms may said .
the greater manchester company , which employs 200 people , expects to make £ 11m from the deal in the next three years .

documents.title: scuba diver 'lucky to be alive ' after 18 hours at sea
text: les brierley , from bury , was rescued after spending 18 hours at sea off australia 's queensland coast .
rescuers said the 68-year-old scuba diver was `` lucky to be alive '' .

documents.title: travel : tram fault causes delays
text: severe delays on manchester metrolink between bury and etihad campus due to faulty tram at bury .
more travel news here .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 'rogue landlord ' fined for failing to fix damp , heating , smoke alarms and defective switches
text: a landlord who left his tenants with chronic damp , limited heating and dangerous electrics has been fined after the council had to step in to complete remedial work .
author: Bolton News
The Bolton News

documents.title: woman in critical condition after hyde crash
text: a woman is in a critical condition following a crash in hyde .
a blue citroen xsara picasso collided with a pedestrian on kendal avenue at about 18:00 on tuesday , police said .
a 20-year-old woman was taken to hospital with head injuries where she remains in a critical condition .

documents.title: 'monstrous ' manchester piccadilly gardens wall to be demolished
text: pictures of a planned £ 10m revamp of a manchester landmark described as a `` concrete monstrosity '' have been revealed .
manchester city council said it had taken public opinion into account to remove the current wall and pavilion in piccadilly gardens .
it said it will improve the quality and safety of the area .
the plans , to be funded by leaseholders legal & general , will go before the executive committee on 16 november .

documents.title: weather : cloudy and wet
text: rain and snow will slowly clear .
cloudy but some bright spells later although showers move in this afternoon .
it will be cold , especially with any lying snow over higher ground .

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: welcome to greater manchester live .
we 're here until 18:00 with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the 10 boroughs and east cheshire .
to share news , tip-offs or photographs you can contact us via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Rachael Lazaro
Reporter, BBC News Online
